description.line 3: • Players get a suggestion and one at a time step forward and deliver a joke or pun with the format below.
description.line 8:
• Suggestion: Banana
    185 bananas walk into a bar.
    The bartender says, we don't serve bananas here.
    The 185 bananas say, what? are we too unappealing for you?
  • Alternate version:
    185 bananas walk into a bar.
    The bartender says, we don't serve bananas here.
    The 185 bananas say, why not?
    and the bartender says, you're too unappealing.
